name: Shakuyaku
text: Your Turn Once Per Turn When a character leaves play from one of your effects, if your opponent has 5 or more cards in hand, they place 1 card from their hand on the bottom of their deck. Then, rest this character.

effect.text: When a character leaves play from one of your effects, if your opponent has 5 or more cards in hand, they place 1 card from their hand on the bottom of their deck. Then, rest this character.
